title: Caged
description: Christian St. James Davenport is a prisoner. He has spent his entire life imprisoned within a gilded cage; trapped by his parentsâ€™ wealth, by his own secrets, and by the fear of his abusive ex-lover, Dwight.Lucca Renaldo is the darkly exotic, older man who will show Christian what it truly means to be free, but not before Dwight returns to reclaim what he believes is his.
author: Michele L. Montgomery
